document.full_text: house of representatives democratic leader nancy pelosi was released from a short stay in a hospital on monday and is resuming her scheduled activities in italy, spokesman nadeam elshami said.
document.title: nancy pelosi briefly hospitalized in rome
lines_and_colors: house of representatives democratic leader nancy pelosi was released from a short stay in a hospital on monday and is resuming her scheduled activities in italy, spokesman nadeam elshami said.
